articles.title: Sacheen Littlefeather, Native American activist and actress, dead at 75 - CNN
articles.description: Sacheen Littlefeather, the Native American actress and activist who made history when she declined the Best Actor Oscar on behalf of Marlon Brando, has died at the age of 75.
